project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Develop a Python-based quiz game that presents multiple-choice questions to the user, tracks their score, and displays the result at the end of the game.

task.name: Define the quiz questions and answers variable
Implement the logic to display each question and its options
Capture user input and validate the responses
Keep track of the user's score based on their responses
Implement functionality to display the final score at the end of the quiz
Write tests for each implemented feature to verify correctness
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
